00024 #ifndef __SYS_INCLUDE_ARCH_X86_RT_SCHED_IMPL_H_
00025 #define __SYS_INCLUDE_ARCH_X86_RT_SCHED_IMPL_H_
00026 
00027 #include <l4/sys/ipc.h>
00028 
00029 L4_INLINE int
00030 l4_rt_generic(l4_threadid_t dest, l4_sched_param_t param,
00031         l4_kernel_clock_t clock)
00032 {
00033   unsigned dummy;
00034   int ret;
00035 
00036   __asm__ __volatile__(
00037     "pushl %%ebp    \n\t" /* save ebp, no memory references
00038              ("m") after this point */
00039     L4_SYSCALL(thread_schedule)
00040     "popl  %%ebp    \n\t" /* restore ebp, no memory references
00041              ("m") before this point */
00042    :
00043     "=a" (ret),
00044     "=c" (dummy),
00045     "=d" (dummy),
00046     "=S" (dummy)
00047    :
00048     "a" (param),
00049     "c" ((l4_uint32_t)clock),
00050     "d" ((l4_uint32_t)(clock>>32)),
00051     "S" (dest.raw)
00052    :
00053     "ebx", "edi"
00054    );
00055   return ret;
00056 }
00057 
00058 
00059 /* Erm, the user shall be allowed to pass "normal" time parameters, not
00060  * the mantissa/exponent coding. Thus, make a reference to the external
00061  * l4util function. */
00062 L4_INLINE int
00063 l4_rt_add_timeslice(l4_threadid_t dest, int prio, int time)
00064 {
00065   l4_sched_param_t sched = {sp:{prio:prio, small:0,
00066         state:L4_RT_ADD_TIMESLICE}};
00067   l4_sched_param_set_time(time, &sched);
00068   return l4_rt_generic(dest, sched, 0);
00069 }
00070 
00071 L4_INLINE int
00072 l4_rt_change_timeslice(l4_threadid_t dest, int id, int prio, int time)
00073 {
00074   l4_sched_param_t sched = {sp:{prio:prio, small:id,
00075         state:L4_RT_CHANGE_TIMESLICE}};
00076   l4_sched_param_set_time(time, &sched);
00077   return l4_rt_generic(dest, sched, 0);
00078 }
00079 
00080 L4_INLINE int
00081 l4_rt_begin_strictly_periodic (l4_threadid_t dest, l4_kernel_clock_t clock)
00082 {
00083   return l4_rt_generic(dest,
00084            (l4_sched_param_t){
00085              sp:{ prio:0, small:0,
00086             state:L4_RT_BEGIN_PERIODIC}},
00087            clock);
00088 }
00089 
00090 L4_INLINE int
00091 l4_rt_begin_minimal_periodic (l4_threadid_t dest, l4_kernel_clock_t clock)
00092 {
00093   return l4_rt_generic(dest,
00094            (l4_sched_param_t){
00095              sp:{prio:0, small: 0,
00096            state:L4_RT_BEGIN_PERIODIC_NS}},
00097            clock);
00098 }
00099 
00100 L4_INLINE int
00101 l4_rt_end_periodic(l4_threadid_t dest)
00102 {
00103   return l4_rt_generic(dest,
00104            (l4_sched_param_t){
00105        sp:{prio:0, small:0,
00106            state:L4_RT_END_PERIODIC}}, 0);
00107 }
00108 
00109 L4_INLINE int
00110 l4_rt_remove(l4_threadid_t dest)
00111 {
00112   return l4_rt_generic(dest,
00113            (l4_sched_param_t){
00114        sp:{prio:0, small:0,
00115            state:L4_RT_REM_TIMESLICES}}, 0);
00116 }
00117 
00118 L4_INLINE void
00119 l4_rt_set_period(l4_threadid_t dest, l4_kernel_clock_t clock)
00120 {
00121   l4_rt_generic(dest,
00122           (l4_sched_param_t){
00123       sp:{prio:0, small:0,
00124           state:L4_RT_SET_PERIOD}},
00125           clock);
00126 }
00127 
00128 L4_INLINE int
00129 l4_rt_next_reservation(unsigned id, l4_kernel_clock_t*clock)
00130 {
00131   long dummy;
00132   int ret;
00133   
00134   __asm__ __volatile__(
00135           "pushl %%ebp          \n\t"   /* save ebp, no memory references
00136                                            ("m") after this point */     
00137           L4_SYSCALL(thread_switch)
00138           "popl  %%ebp          \n\t"   /* restore ebp, no memory references
00139                                            ("m") before this point */
00140           :
00141           "=a" (ret),
00142     "=c" (((l4_low_high_t*)clock)->low),
00143     "=d" (((l4_low_high_t*)clock)->high),
00144           "=S" (dummy)
00145           :
00146           "S" (0),
00147           "a" (id)
00148           :
00149           "ebx", "edi"
00150           );
00151   return ret;
00152 }
00153 
00154 L4_INLINE int
00155 l4_rt_next_period(void)
00156 {
00157   l4_umword_t dummy;
00158   l4_msgdope_t result;
00159   return l4_ipc_receive(l4_next_period_id(L4_NIL_ID),
00160       L4_IPC_SHORT_MSG,
00161       &dummy, &dummy, L4_IPC_BOTH_TIMEOUT_0,
00162       &result);
00163 }
00164 
00165 L4_INLINE int
00166 l4_rt_dp_reserve(int duration)
00167 {
00168   /* no-op */
00169   return 0;
00170 }
00171 
00172 L4_INLINE void
00173 l4_rt_dp_remove(void){
00174   /* no-op */
00175 }
00176 
00177 L4_INLINE void
00178 l4_rt_dp_begin(void){
00179   __asm__ __volatile__ ("cli" : : : "memory");
00180 }
00181 
00182 L4_INLINE void
00183 l4_rt_dp_end(void){
00184   __asm__ __volatile__ ("sti" : : : "memory");
00185 }
00186 #endif /* ! __L4_SYS__RT_SCHED_H__ */
